title: KUNG FU PANDA 4
desc: Kung Fu Panda 4 is fun for the whole family -- maybe not as much fun as the first three, but still a good time. Read audience reviews

title: Fallout
desc: Fallout is the story of haves and have-nots in a world in which there’s almost nothing left to have. title: Attack on Titan
desc: According to the manga's plot, 100 years before the events of the manga began, humanity was almost completely destroyed by an unknown humanoid race of enormous creatures called titans . People were forced to take refuge behind three high walls, which were given the names Sina ( Japanese:  Shīna ) , Rose ( Japanese:  Rōze ) , and Maria ( Japanese: Marī ) . People lived like this for many years, thinking that they were completely safe. Behind each wall, on the outside, districts were built - towns that served as an outer line of defense and were also surrounded by walls.,

title: Evangelion
desc: According to the plot of the anime and manga, in 2000, the organization Seele organized an expedition to Antarctica , led by Dr. Katsuragi. This expedition found a creature in Antarctica, later called the First Angel , Adam. As a result of the experiment conducted on him in accordance with Seele's plans  , a cataclysm occurred, called the Second Impact. The true cause of the cataclysm was hidden from the public. According to the official version, a meteorite crashed into Antarctica at near-light speed. As a result of the cataclysm, the planet changed the tilt of its axis, which led to global climate change and eternal summer in Japan . A significant part of the land went under water. Half of humanity was destroyed, the rest plunged into wars. The first year after the Second Impact became a hell that cannot be described in words [ 11 ] . The entire expedition team led by Dr. Katsuragi was also killed, with the exception of Gendo Ikari , who had left Antarctica shortly before the disaster, and Dr. Katsuragi's daughter, Misato , whom her father had saved at the cost of his own life. Following Second Impact, the Gehirn Institute was established to further Seele's plans and develop the combat bio-robots, Evangelions , needed to combat the Angels. Following the suicide of the institute's leading scientist, Naoko Akagi , Gehirn was transformed into the Nerv Institute . Along with these two organizations , the Marduk Institute was established , charged with searching the world for Evangelion pilot candidates.
